mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pns.pns a WHERE a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} AND a.SIDE=#{side}

SELECT a.OID PNSOID, a.POID,customer.USERNAME PONAME, a.PRICE, a.QUANT, a.NET, a.MAX, a.MIN FROM pns.pns a INNER JOIN crm.customer ON a.POID=crm.customer.ID WHERE a.SIDE=#{side} AND a.PNSGID=#{pnsgid} AND a.PNSID=#{pnsid} AND a.STATUS IN ('PUBLISHED', 'HALF_TRADED') ORDER BY a.PRICE ASC LIMIT #{num}, 10
